basics.name: Account Service Representative II/Tech
basics.label: Account Manager
basics.summary: Professional Account Manager trained in building strategic network ties and increasing sales revenues. Cultivates and maintains strong customer relationships.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Funneled customer service skills and a strategic vision of personalized wireless to generate sales goals and satisfy customer standards. Underwent promotion to level II position based on performance and experience.
highlights: Named Employee of the Month in 02/2014 at C Spire
Winner of the C Spire Employee of the Quarter Award, 1st Quarter 2014
Maintained 100% Survey Rating entire tenure at Foshee Residential
Top 5 in New Accounts at Foshee Residential (2012)
Achieved 1st Place Southeast Regionals American Kickboxing Academy Tournament (3x) for ShogunMMA

work.name: Henderson-Thomas
work.summary: Led the design and development of user experiences, graphics, animations, and interactions for Web sites, portals, and applications. Contributed to building the Company brand across multiple platforms. Performed research to communicate trends and best-practices related to visual design and branding.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Supervised staff and assisted them in performing at or above expectations. Provided customer relations for superior satisfaction. Monitored property vendors and dealt with tenant issues in a timely manner. Accountable for market surveys and maintained lease occupancies and rents at highest desired level.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Instructed students in various martial arts techniques. Provided reports to clients and gave assistance to the management team. Collaborated with clients to identify and implement value added services. Grew customer base from 13 to 34 accounts in 2 years.

courses: Coursework in Business Administration and Management
